00080 #ifndef NUM_ELEMENTS
00081 # ifdef __DMC__
00082 #  define NUM_ELEMENTS(ar)      (sizeof(ar) / sizeof(ar[0]))
00083 # else /* ? compiler */
00084 #  define NUM_ELEMENTS(ar)      (sizeof(ar) / sizeof(0[ar]))
00085 # endif /* compiler */
00086 #endif /* !NUM_ELEMENTS */
00087 
00088 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00089  * Linkage specifications
00090  */
00091 
00097 #if defined(__BORLANDC__)
00098 # define UNIXEM_STGCLS_IMP      __declspec(dllimport)
00099 #elif defined(__DMC__) || \
00100       defined(__INTEL_COMPILER) || \
00101       defined(__MWERKS__) || \
00102       defined(_MSC_VER)
00103 # if defined(_MT)
00104 #  define UNIXEM_STGCLS_IMP     __declspec(dllimport)
00105 # else /* ? _MT */
00106 #  define UNIXEM_STGCLS_IMP
00107 # endif /* _MT */
00108 #else
00109 # define UNIXEM_STGCLS_IMP
00110 #endif /* compiler */
